title: The Gospel of Mary and Contemporary Issues

questions.question: What is the primary focus of the Gospel of Mary regarding Mary Magdalene's role?
choices: Her role as Jesus' wife
Her role as a spiritual leader and teacher
Her role as a repentant sinner
Her role as Jesus' mother
questions.answer: Her role as a spiritual leader and teacher

questions.question: In what century is the Gospel of Mary believed to have been written?
choices: 1st century CE
2nd century CE
3rd century CE
4th century CE
questions.answer: 2nd century CE

questions.question: How does the Gospel of Mary's portrayal of spiritual authority differ from some other early Christian texts?
choices: It emphasizes hierarchical structures
It focuses on the authority of male apostles
It suggests authority should be based on understanding of Jesus' teachings
It rejects the concept of spiritual authority entirely
questions.answer: It suggests authority should be based on understanding of Jesus' teachings
